itsZORF
ZORF is a growing collection of NFTs with original theme songs, that explores the future of culture in both meta-space and meat-space.

   It's cultural noise—art that's both digital and physical, spiritual and corporeal, serious and not serious.

   The characters and story of these NFTs will be brought to meat-space through a collection of real clothing, and other meat treats. Enoy zorfing ☮

Drinkable NFTs
That's right, the first NFTs that you can drink! Just put your mouth around your power adapter, and you will taste the future of beverages.
